title: Ticket #2131: CCB reconnect crashes if socket creation fails
description:
The following crash of the master was observed on a test machine at ANI when the network was down: 

04/19/11 19:28:30 Calling Timer handler 7842 (CCBListener::ReconnectTime)
04/19/11 19:28:40 ERROR "Assertion ERROR on (sock)" at line 548 in file /home/condor/execute/dir_12455/userdir/src/condor_daemon_client/daemon.cpp
check_ins: 2011-May-05 17:28   Check-in [21798]: Fixed a crash in CCB when reconnecting during a network outage. ===GT=== #2131 ===VersionHistory=== Fixed a problem that could cause Condor daemons to crash when reconnecting to CCB during a network outage. (By Dan Bradley )
